ProjectTitle: Exploring the potential of water-soluble cereal constituents for stabilizing air-in-water dispersions in food products

Have you considered using a repository for data preservation and sharing? Reading the submission guidelines of candidate repositories may help you to decide which metadata to collect in the readme files along with your experiments. If there are no suitable repositories for your domain you can use KU Leuven RDR: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
